title: Drugs and beyond
creator_credit: Extension Media Center, University of California
brief_description: Raises the question of whether a variety of mind controlling substances can be used for positive purposes such as increased learning power, memory stimulation, accelerated maturing processes, mood change or tension control. The emphasis is on manipulation of consciousness or behaviour rather than alteration or awareness expansion.
